name: trail_r
description:
Leave a trail of clones to help you reach the end of the levels in this simple puzzle platformer!

trail_r was made in one week for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2

Special thanks to Brackeys and Unity for helping me make my first game!

-

INSTRUCTIONS:

Download trail_r.zip and extract all, and run trail_r.exe

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys or A & D = move

Spacebar = jump

Q = create a clone of yourself

R = restart the current level

Alt-F4 = quit game
